definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: The shovel is the one tool that Davis and his fellow principal investigators do not use.
sentences.chinese: 鏟子是戴維斯和他的主要調查者棄之不用的工具。

sentences.english: Most of the respondents started cross-dressing between the ages of 11 to 20 years old.
sentences.chinese: 大多數的被調查者都在11歲到20歲時開始變裝。

sentences.english: Investigators have, however, pondered one other remote possibility.
sentences.chinese: 但是，調查者們還考慮了另外一種不太可能的情況。

sentences.english: They showed respondents three unlabeled pie charts.
sentences.chinese: 他們向被調查者出示了三張不帶標籤的餅狀圖。

sentences.english: A large number feel the United States is -- or soon will be -- in a recession.
sentences.chinese: 相當多的被調查者覺得美國經濟在衰退，或即將衰退。

sentences.english: Respondents cited the state of the world as their second biggest cause of stress.
sentences.chinese: 調查者引用世界形勢是第二個造成壓力的原因。

sentences.english: According to Newey, voters expect to be lied to in certain circumstances, and sometimes even require it.
sentences.chinese: 被調查者是希望，甚至要求在某種情況下被騙的。

sentences.english: He angrily accused the investigators of slandering both him and his family.
sentences.chinese: 他氣憤地指責調查者詆譭他和他的家人。

sentences.english: Of those polled, seven out of ten said they preferred brown bread.
sentences.chinese: 那些被調查者十人中有七人說他們比較愛喫黑麪包。

sentences.english: Investigators have been using heavy machinery to dig for the bodies which were buried in pits.
sentences.chinese: 調查者正用重型機器來發掘被埋葬在地坑裏的遺體。

sentences.english: Curvy women are more likely to live longer than their slimmer counterparts, researchers have found.
sentences.chinese: 調查者發現，有曲線的女人比更纖瘦的女人更長壽。

sentences.english: The investigators had found, for example, someone who had admitted shooting the video of Rosenberg’s testimony.
sentences.chinese: 比如，調查者發現有人承認拍攝了羅森博格證詞錄像。

sentences.english: The drug has proved controversial among sex researchers.
sentences.chinese: 性調查者對該藥物存在爭議。

sentences.english: Male and female informants ' anxious level's difference isn't significant in statistics.
sentences.chinese: 男性和女性被調查者焦慮水平差異無統計學意義。

sentences.english: Of those polled, nine out of ten said they preferred the new product.
sentences.chinese: 百分之九十的被調查者說，他們喜歡新產品。

sentences.english: The prevalences of chronic diseases and distribution of diseases in retired cadres were retrospectively analysed.
sentences.chinese: 回顧性分析被調查者慢性病的發病率和病種分佈情況。
